data.title: List of Famous Bands from Italy
data.meta_description: List of Italy bands, listed by their level of fame. This Italy musicians list includes both bands and solo artists. All famous Italy bands are included, as ...
data.text:
List of Italy bands, listed by their level of fame. This Italy musicians list includes both bands and solo artists. All famous Italy bands are included, as well as many Italy musicians of underground status. This list of Italy musical artists includes information like what genre the artist falls under, what albums they've put out and more. If you want to know more about these famous Italy bands you can click on their names to learn more about them. Bands from every genre are listed here, including rock, pop, hip-hop/rap, jazz, and more.

Bands include everything from Laura Pausini to Rhapsody of Fire.

If you're wondering, "What bands are from Italy?" or "What is a list of Italy bands?" then this list will answer your questions. {#nodes}

Ranked by

Adult contemporary music, Pop music, Latin pop

Albums : Laura, La mia risposta, From the Inside, Tra te e il mare, Resta in ascolto

Bursting onto the music scene in 1993 with her debut single "La Solitudine," Laura Pausini quickly became a household name for her emotive ballads and captivating voice. With millions of album sales under her belt and a myriad of awards, including several Latin GRAMMYs, Pausini's incredible talent has been recognized by fans and critics alike. Not only a star in her home country, she's also achieved international success, releasing songs in multiple languages and becoming a beloved icon all around the world. Laura Pausini's heartfelt lyrics and mesmerizing vocal prowess will continue to captivate audiences for years to come.

Progressive metal, Power metal, Heavy metal

Albums : Dawn of Victory, Symphony of Enchanted Lands, The Frozen Tears of Angels, From Chaos to Eternity, Triumph or Agony

Heralded as pioneers of the symphonic power metal genre since their formation in 1993, Rhapsody of Fire has consistently pushed the boundaries of heavy metal with their theatrical performances and intricate storytelling. Integrating elements of classical music, opera, and film score-like orchestration, the band takes listeners on a fantastical journey through epic tales and powerful emotions. Their ambitious concept albums have garnered them a dedicated fanbase that spans the globe. Rhapsody of Fire continues to redefine their genre and captivate listeners with their undeniably unique sound.

Progressive metal, Gothic rock, Symphonic black metal

Albums : Comalies, In a Reverie, Unleashed Memories, Shallow Life, Enjoy the Silence

Since their formation in 1994, Lacuna Coil has been enchanting audiences with their distinctive blend of gothic and alternative metal. Led by the hypnotic dual vocals of Cristina Scabbia and Andrea Ferro, the band has created an unmistakable sound that has captivated listeners and earned them a dedicated worldwide fanbase. Over the years, they have continually refined their craft, delivering darker, heavier, and more introspective works. As they continue to evolve, Lacuna Coil remains a resolute force in the world of heavy music.

Adult contemporary music, Pop music, Opera

Albums : Carmen - Duets & Arias, Georges Bizet, Sentimento, Romanza, Amore

A true international sensation with one of the most recognizable voices in contemporary opera, Andrea Bocelli has captured the hearts of millions with his breathtaking renditions of classical and pop compositions. Blind since a young age, Bocelli's incredible vocal talent has led him to work alongside some of the music industry's biggest stars, such as Celine Dion, Ed Sheeran, and Sarah Brightman. With numerous awards to his name and record-breaking album sales, Andrea Bocelli's emotive performances continue to leave audiences worldwide utterly spellbound.

Lounge music, Classical music, Easy listening

Albums : Once Upon a Time in America, The Good, the Bad and the Ugly, Duck You, Sucker

With a career that spanned over six decades, the late Ennio Morricone is widely regarded as one of the finest film composers of all time. Known for his innovative and unforgettable scores, Morricone's music has become synonymous with classic Italian cinema, particularly through his iconic collaborations with director Sergio Leone on the "Dollars Trilogy" of spaghetti westerns. From haunting melodies to lush orchestrations, his compositions have left an indelible mark on the world of music. Ennio Morricone's legendary status endures, with a legacy that will undoubtedly inspire generations of musicians to come.

Hip hop music, Electronic music, Electro house

Albums : ONELOVE 08 Sound Machine, From Then Until Now, Tons of Friends, Remedy, Crookers Remixed

Synonymous with genre-bending electronic music, Crookers have left an indelible mark on the dance music scene since their formation in 2003. Known for their eclectic style that fuses elements of electro, house, and hip-hop, the duo has developed a distinct sound that has attracted fans and collaborators from all corners of the globe. With remixes for some of the industry's biggest names, including Kid Cudi and Major Lazer, and several critically acclaimed albums to their name, Crookers undeniably stands as a pioneering force in the world of electronic music.
